Pre-Game Insights: England might finally end their losing streak and win the game.
Jonny Bairstow has been abysmal throughout this World Cup, but he is a quality batter and can score big in this game against a slightly weaker bowling lineup on a nice batting surface.
Dawid Malan has been among the few positives for England in an otherwise shocking campaign, and he will look to play long and notch up another big score.
Jos Buttler has surprisingly been picked up by less than 41% of users as of now, making him a good differential pick.
Max O'Dowd has been selected by less than 16% of people as of now, and he has done well against England previously, so he will look to stay longer on a surface known to assist the batters.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The track in Pune has always been pleasant for the batters, and another flat surface is expected.
